title: Magus of the Traitor

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - There's a Town Traitor allied with the Coven. See https://town-of-salem.fandom.com/wiki/Game_Modes#Town_Traitor for details.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Roleblock someone each night. If you have the Necronomicon, you may attack them instead.

desc:
Post 373
*Bend to my will.*
Roleblock immune
